Lisk | https://lisk.io/ | Full Time | On Site | Berlin, Germany

Lisk is a platform and framework for JavaScript developers to deploy their own blockchain and build decentralised applications. We have our own cryptocurrency LSK, are funded, still have a small number of employees, and we want to make blockchains mainstream.

* (Senior) Back end developer: NodeJS, Javascript (ES5&ES6), PostgreSQL (PGpromise), Git (Gitflow), Test-driven development, Understanding of P2P networks and cryptography, Bonus: TypeScript

* (Senior) Front end developer: Expert of HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript (ES5&ES6), and SVG, Advanced knowledge of Angular 1.x / 2, Knowledge of Grunt, NPM, Bower, and Electron, Git (Gitflow)

Feel free to apply with our contact us form (https://lisk.io/contact_us), or reach out directly: max @ lisk.io

Thanks!
